resources.string: It is okay to release your feelings every once in a while. \nHowever, try to calm yourself as everything will eventually be resolved.
This seems like medical advice. Call your doctor for more assistance.

string-array.name: redcolor
string-array.item: Should I wear red or blue

resources.string: The color red makes you more aware of your mistakes and how to fix them. However, it may make you more nervous.

string-array.name: vorc
string-array.item: Which ice cream should I get?

string.string: Vanilla gives you the highest energy boost out of all ice cream. But, chocolate can give you a thinking boost for your brain.
Eat some fruits or vegetables.\n If you\'re really craving it, then you can have some junk food just do it in moderation.

string-array.name: sleep
string-array.item: What time should I go to sleep?

string.string: Try to go to sleep at a reasonable hour so you get around 8 hours of sleep.\n You should only pull an all-nighter if you absolutely need to do something productive.
Lower your expectations. You only need to study and leave the rest to your wits.
Then, why did you download the app?
How do you do, user?\n How about telling me some decisions to help you?
Yes, now is definitely the time to present.
